update.code: "exports.run={usage:[\"add\"],use:\"enter number or reply\",category:\"group\",async:async(a,{anya:r,froms:t})=>{try{let e;if(a.quoted&&a.quoted.mtype&&/contactMessage/.test(a.quoted.mtype)){var n=a.quoted.vcard.match(/TEL;waid=\\d+:(\\+?\\d{1,3} \\d{1,4}-\\d{1,4}-\\d{1,4})/);n&&(e=[n[1].replace(/[^0-9]/gi,\"\")+\"@s.whatsapp.net\"])}else{if(!(a.quoted&&a.quoted.sender||a.text))return a.reply(\"Enter number or Reply chat target.\");if(t.startsWith(\"08\"))return a.reply(\"Awali nomor dengan +62\");e=0!==a.mentionedJid.length?a.mentionedJid.slice(0,2):a.quoted?[a.quoted.sender]:(await Promise.all(a.text.split(\",\").map(e=>e.replace(/[^0-9]/g,\"\")).filter(e=>4<e.length&&e.length<20).map(async e=>[e,await r.onWhatsApp(e+\"@s.whatsapp.net\")]))).filter(e=>e[1][0]?.exists).map(e=>e[0]+\"@s.whatsapp.net\").slice(0,2)}e&&await r.groupParticipantsUpdate(a.chat,e,\"add\").then(async e=>{for(var t of e)403==t.status?(r.sendMessage(a.chat,{text:\"Diprivasi. mengirimkan groupInvite kepada @\"+t.jid.split(\"@\")[0],mentions:[t.jid]},{quoted:a,ephemeralExpiration:a.expiration}),r.sendGroupInvite(a.chat,t.jid,{inviteCode:t.content.content[0].attrs.code,inviteExpiration:t.content.content[0].attrs.expiration,groupName:a.groupName,jpegThumbnail:await r.profilePictureUrl(a.chat,\"image\").catch(e=>\"https://telegra.ph/file/0d25a520bfa0909c74466.jpg\"),caption:\"Undangan untuk bergabung ke grup WhatsApp saya\",quoted:null})):409==t.status?a.reply(`@${t.jid.split(\"@\")[0]} already in this group`):408==t.status?a.reply(`@${t.jid.split(\"@\")[0]} has left the group recently`):401==t.status?a.reply(\"Bot blocked by @\"+t.jid.split(\"@\")[0]):a.reply(\"Successfully added member\")})}catch(e){return a.reply(\"Maaf terjadi kesalahan.\")}},group:!0,admin:!0,botAdmin:!0};"
